summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2593, for the improvement of the east half of 36th Avenue West from Government Way to Lawton Place, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, and by the construction of curbs and gutters, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 30248 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
